import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SaleService } from '../services/sale.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { SaleModel } from '../models/sale.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list-sales', templateUrl: './list-sales.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list-sales.component.css'] }) export class ListSalesComponent { constructor (private saleService : SaleService, private router : Router){ } sales : SaleModel[] = []; }
